description:
The Evil Hacker launched a dangerous virus into your network! Now harmful monsters-viruses are trying to destroy the network. Solving the fascinating puzzles and do not let them go down to the bottom edge!

Rotate the colored blocks to connect them in one chain. Try to hold the network under bonuses and monsters — bonuses will be activated, and monsters will get damage. But not all monsters can be destroyed the first time!

Interesting levels and logic tasks will help you relax and rest.

GAME FEATURES:
- Two game modes — missions and survival;
- Charismatic and dangerous monsters!
- Powerful bonuses on the levels!
- Various types of tasks on the levels
name: Pipes Puzzle Casual Arcade
intro: Connect all the colored blocks in one chain and defeat the monsters-viruses!
